gameplayModel

Class GridObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • gameplayModel.GridObject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnimatedObject, Concrete, Exitway, PowerUp

    public class GridObject
extends java.lang.Object
    This class as as the SuperClass of all different type of GridObject. It controls each object's location, zooming, size, and what happens if they collide with concrete
    Author:
    Chao Yue

      • resizeImage

        public static java.awt.image.BufferedImage resizeImage(java.awt.image.BufferedImage imageIn,
                                       int factor)
        This method draw each GridObjects on the GridMap in 2D Graphics It uses image buffering to load the drawing onto the Map
        Parameters:
        imageIn - the input image being buffered
        factor - the enlargement factor used for input image
        Returns:
        the output image
